name: Serene Sovereignty
description:
Serene Sovereignty

This is not your usual clicker, this game takes the clicker genre in another direction by adding an element of strategy and base defense into the mix.

Grow your army and defense your kingdom as long as you can before it inevitably falls.

Made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023

Play Instructions / Controls:

when you start a new game there are a few things you should know:

1. See that farm house looking building in-front (and a bit to the left) of the town hall? Thats the farm house, you can click on it to earn gold (see it's a clicker 😉).

2. you much purchase neutral units from the toolbar at the bottom.

3. You can use the other buttons to purchase jobs for your neutral units, these jobs range from farmers that earn gold for you, swordsmen that defend your kingdom, archers to attack from afar, and a few more.

4. you can increase the gold you earn by clicking and the gold your farmers earn by upgrading the farm house. The number on the button is the farm house level (and the amount of gold you earn) and the number below it is the cost to upgrade the farm house another level.

Alright, I've given you all the information I can. The rest is up to you to figure out.

Have fun, and good luck.
